title: ±0 Typeface (Grotesque font)
content: I'm wondering if anyone can figure out what typeface ±0 uses in their work ( [http://www.pmz-store.jp/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20121029085212/http:/www.pmz-store.jp/index.html "http://www.pmz-store.jp/index.html")). It's a very nice grotesque font. Any ideas?
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content:
Good call raph! Thanks how could I forget the lovely DIN; more specifically in this case DIN Mittelschrift.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
